Package pegasus.pointer

package pegasus.pointer
  • Class
    Description
    ArrayPointer<T>
    An array-based generic pointer.
    BasePointer<T>
    The base interface for Pegasus pointers.
    DoubleArrayPointer
    An array-based double pointer.
    DoublePointer
    A value-based primitive pointer of double values.
    IntArrayPointer
    An array-based int pointer.
    IntPointer
    A value-based primitive pointer of int values.
    LongArrayPointer
    An array-based long pointer.
    LongPointer
    A value-based primitive pointer of long values.
    ObjectPointer<T>
    A reference-based generic pointer.
    Pointers
    Contains pointer utilities.
